skins.shipDescription: Gato-class submarine C Cavalla, Hull Number SS-244.
skins.selfIntroduction: I was given a golden opportunity during my maiden voyage and sank a carrier! ... It was a pretty risky move, and it wasn't easy! But in the end, I came out on top! If you wanna hear the whole story, just ask!
skins.acquisition: I'm Cavalla, the Eagle Union submarine! I'll make this fleet famous through glorious victories, so just you wait, Commander!
skins.login: Morning! You're right on time today!
skins.details: I'm no fish out of water that can't fight on the surface! It's no problem for me!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Could we make submarines stronger? By, for example... giving them stronger, better weapons or something?
skins.secretaryIdle2: It's so boring to just sit here and twiddle my thumbs... Give me something to do, Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Whew! The breeze feels almost as good on land as it does at sea!
skins.secretaryTouch: Ahahaha~! Stop! Ahahah~! That ticklesC ahahaha!

skins.shipDescription: You're late, Commander! ... What's all this? Heheh, it's loot I got from the stop n' rob's bargain bin! Here, have some bread!
skins.acquisition: You're late, Commander! ... What's all this? Heheh, it's loot I got from the stop n' rob's bargain bin! Here, have some bread!
skins.login: I've been waiting for you, Commander!
skins.details: Some snacks for Albacore and a torpedo model kit for Dace... These convenience stores really have everything, don't they!
skins.secretaryIdle1: IT'S A SUPER RARE! Holy mackerel! Commander, look! Hehehe~ See what I just got?!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I snagged myself a limited-edition Sara plushie! Aren't you jealous~? ... Y-you already own one? D-did they scam me?!
skins.secretaryIdle3: School life is a lot more fun than I expected! I might just be a natural scholar!
skins.secretaryTouch: No, Commander! You can't have my precious discounted chips!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I bet you waited for me to leave school just to do that!

skins.shipDescription: Look at all the cute balloons and flowers, and the delicious food as well! Hehe! Parties are the best!
skins.acquisition: Look at all the cute balloons and flowers, and the delicious food as well! Hehe! Parties are the best!
skins.login: Oh! I've been waiting for you, Commander! I was seriously worried that you'd gotten yourself lost!
skins.details: Here, Commander! A bouquet for you! I heard from Shoukaku that you like these!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'll gather up tons of balloons then take off into the sky! Yeah, as if! Hehehe~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hrrmm, still not old enough to drink, huh... I'm not a kid anymore, so what's the big deal?!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Teach me how to dance, Commander! I wanna do it with you like everyone else does!
skins.secretaryTouch: A toast to the party! Hehehe~ That's how you do it, right?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I'm gonna tell on you for that!
